original: Did you understand any of that?

original: Those were the best years of my life.

original: Sami was trapped in the basement.

original: I didn't move a thing.

original: Shouldn't you be at school?

original: Stop playing cat and mouse with me and tell me the news.

original: I love that film.

original: You're carrying your joke a bit too far.

original: He cooked me dinner.

original: I won't go anywhere without you.

original: Tom loved Mary.

original: The library is open until nine.
translated: La bibliothèque est ouverte jusqu'à neuf heures.

original: I love your sweater.

original: Tom abandoned his family.

original: I caught him by the arm.
translated: Je l'ai attrapé par le bras.

original: Where would you like to go?

original: I haven't got a mobile phone.

original: Stop being cruel.

original: He and I had a bit to eat.

original: Let us pray for a perfect, an eternal, peace.
translated: Prions pour une paix parfaite et éternelle.

original: It's okay to take it easy sometimes.
translated: C'est bien parfois de ne pas se prendre la tête.

original: I think you're wrong.
translated: Je pense que tu te trompes.

original: Mayuko dreamt a strange dream.
translated: Mayuko a fait un rêve étrange.

original: Do you know when Tom will get back?
translated: Savez-vous quand Tom reviendra ?

original: I must know the truth about her.
translated: Je dois savoir la vérité sur elle.

original: I recovered from my illness.
translated: Je me suis remis de ma maladie.

original: Don't take everything so literally.
translated: Ne prends pas tout si littéralement.

original: Natto is sticky.
translated: Le natto est collant.

original: I know that it's highly unlikely I'll be able to convince you that you're wrong.
translated: Je sais qu'il est très improbable que j'arrive à te convaincre que tu as tort.

original: Shut up. If you don't, you'll be thrown out.
translated: Ferme-la. Sinon, tu seras virée.

original: I have only five thousand yen.
translated: J'ai seulement 5000 yens.

original: He had to clean his room.
translated: Il devait ranger sa chambre.

original: Everybody seeks happiness.
translated: Tout le monde recherche le bonheur.

original: No one shall be held guilty of any penal offence on account of any act or omission which did not constitute a penal offence, under national or international law, at the time when it was committed. Nor shall a heavier penalty be imposed than the one that was applicable at the time the penal offence was committed.
translated: Nul ne sera condamné pour des actions ou omissions qui, au moment où elles ont été commises, ne constituaient pas un acte délictueux d'après le droit national ou international. De même, il ne sera infligé aucune peine plus forte que celle qui était applicable au moment où l'acte délictueux a été commis.

original: You know that your English is good when people stop complimenting you on how good your English is.
translated: Vous savez que votre anglais est bon lorsque les gens arrêtent de vous en complimenter.

original: Take your seats, please.

original: It's a complex issue.

original: Come in.

original: I felt embarrassed at first.

original: I cheered.

original: He went away from home three years ago, and has never been heard of since.
translated: Il a quitté la maison il y a trois ans, et on n'a plus jamais entendu parler de lui depuis.

original: It is no use going to school if you are not going to study.

original: I like to dress this way.

original: Even after it was hit, the pole was still upright.

original: I like the color green.

original: We must concentrate on that.

original: You look busy.

original: Allow me to go with you.

original: Kabylia has its own flag, its national anthem and its own constitution.

original: Tom terrified Mary.

original: Are you a singer?

translated: Je devins riche.

original: I know it's one of your pet peeves.
translated: Je sais que c'est une de vos irritations préférées.

original: You're very resourceful.
translated: Tu es pleine de ressources.

original: Why would I laugh?
translated: Pourquoi rirais-je ?

original: He was very busy all day.
translated: Il a été très occupé toute la journée.

original: She is full of adventure.
translated: Elle regorge d'aventures.

original: If I'm not too busy, I'll help you tomorrow.
translated: Si je ne suis pas trop occupée, je t'aiderai demain.

original: I think you know that that's not a good idea.
translated: Je pense que tu sais que ce n'est pas une bonne idée.

original: Tom should study French.
translated: Tom devrait étudier le français.

original: Cats have two ears.
translated: Les chats ont deux oreilles.

original: Are they already there?
translated: Sont-ils déjà là ?

original: I think you saw something.
translated: Je pense que tu as vu quelque chose.

original: I have eaten a lot this morning.
translated: J'ai beaucoup mangé ce matin.

original: I don't like wearing flip-flops.
translated: Je n'aime pas porter des tongs.

original: I started learning German two years ago.
translated: J'ai commencé à apprendre l'allemand il y a deux ans.

original: I've got to do this right now.
translated: Je dois faire ça tout de suite.

original: We've all got ears.
translated: Nous sommes tous pourvus d'oreilles.

original: Do you want some wine?
translated: Voulez-vous du vin ?

original: Experts say coffee prices are rising mainly because people are willing to pay more.
translated: Les experts disent que les prix du café augmentent principalement parce que les gens sont disposés à payer davantage.

original: Show me what you're holding.
translated: Montre-moi ce que tu tiens.

original: I'm not creative.
translated: Je ne suis pas créative.

original: We're busy.
translated: Nous sommes occupés.

original: Tom said Mary was Canadian.
translated: Tom a dit que Mary était Canadienne.

original: She seldom puts sugar in her coffee.
translated: Elle met rarement du sucre dans son café.

original: I've lived here for more than three years.
translated: Je vis ici depuis plus de trois ans.

original: He's lying.
translated: Il ment.

original: He banged on the table with his fist.
translated: Il frappa du poing sur la table.

original: Do you know why Tom doesn't like Mary?
translated: Savez-vous pourquoi Tom n'aime pas Mary ?

original: Members of that tribe settled along the river.
translated: Les membres de cette tribu se sont installés le long de la rivière.

original: I need new tires.
translated: Il me faut des pneus neufs.

original: He grows a mustache.
translated: Il se laisse pousser la moustache.

original: The conflict between blacks and whites in the city became worse.
translated: Le conflit entre les blancs et les noirs dans la ville s'empira.

original: You ought to have started half an hour ago.
translated: Vous auriez dû démarrer il y a une demi-heure.

original: I didn't notice him go out.
translated: Je n'ai pas remarqué qu'il était sorti.

original: I have decided to tell him that I like him.
translated: J'ai décidé de lui dire que je l'aime.

original: He is absorbed in playing tennis, but his brother goes in more for football and baseball.
translated: Il est absorbé à jouer au tennis, mais son frère fait plus du football et du baseball.

original: Could we have a spoon?
translated: Pourrions-nous avoir une cuillère ?

original: How many Russian words do you know?
translated: Combien de mots russes connais-tu ?

original: I care for no man on earth, and no man on earth cares for me.
translated: Je ne me soucie d'aucun homme sur terre et aucun homme sur terre ne se soucie de moi.

original: The road is in a deplorable state.
translated: La route se trouve dans un état déplorable.

original: Are you sure you want to leave now?
translated: Êtes-vous sûre de vouloir partir maintenant ?

original: I don't like the texture of raisins.
translated: Je n'aime pas la texture des raisins secs.

original: Clean up the kitchen.
translated: Nettoie la cuisine.

original: If UFOs were to attack the earth, what would become of us?
translated: Si des OVNI attaquaient la Terre, qu'adviendrait-il de nous ?

original: Rather than doing any good, the rain did a great deal of harm to the crop.
translated: La pluie a causé de gros dégâts à la récolte, plutôt qu'elle lui a fait quoi que ce soit de bien.

original: I'll take the most expensive one.
translated: Je vais prendre la plus chère.

original: It calms me down.
translated: Ça me calme.

original: Today I'm lacking inspiration.
translated: Aujourd'hui je manque d'inspiration.

original: It only works on Windows.
translated: Ça ne marche que sous Windows.

original: Was this letter written by Mary?
translated: Cette lettre a-t-elle été écrite par Mary ?

original: Just tell them no.
translated: Dis-leur simplement non.

original: He could not answer that question.
translated: Il ne put répondre à cette question.

original: Would you like to take a recess?
translated: Voudriez-vous prendre un congé ?

original: Change your shirt.
translated: Change ta chemise.

original: In autumn, the moon is really beautiful.
translated: En automne, la lune est très belle.

original: That's not a crime.
translated: Ce n'est pas un crime.

original: Explain it in simple words.
translated: Explique-le avec des mots simples.

original: It didn't not work.
translated: Ça n'a pas du tout mal fonctionné.

original: He walks quickly.
translated: Il marche vite.

original: The bug is underneath me.
translated: La bestiole se trouve sous moi.

original: Tom would've preferred to stay home.
translated: Tom aurait préféré rester à la maison.

original: The colonnade of the basilica of Saint Peter is truly grand and beautiful.
translated: La colonnade de la basilique saint-Pierre est vraiment grande et magnifique.

original: Where do I claim my baggage?
translated: Où est-ce que je récupère mes bagages ?

original: He has been busy since this morning.
translated: Il a été occupé depuis ce matin.

original: He is near a church.
translated: Il se situe à proximité de l'église.

original: I must get through with reading the book by tomorrow.
translated: Je dois avoir fini de lire ce livre d'ici demain.

original: Miho was in the living room when I visited her.
translated: Miho était dans le salon quand je lui ai rendu visite.
